Name: Crimea
Ingredients: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
15 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: MUDDLE coriander in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: Fragrant, herbal gin with a hint of citrus.
History: Adapted from a drink discovered in 2006 at Ballroom, London, England.
